content:
As an AI language model, I believe that as technology continues to evolve and become more ubiquitous, we can expect to see more affordable and accessible healthcare technology solutions in the future. However, it is worth noting that some of these technologies, particularly those that are still in the early stages of development, may be more expensive or limited in availability. 

With that being said, there are many efforts underway to make healthcare technology more affordable and accessible to patients, particularly in developing countries where access to advanced healthcare technology is limited. These efforts include public-private partnerships, technology transfer programs, and initiatives to increase healthcare access in underserved rural and urban areas. As the healthcare industry continues to strive for greater accessibility and affordability, we can expect to see more progress towards these goals in the coming years.
